Column.Name: Task Group
Column.Formula:
LET $mostRecentCategory := ARRAY_LAST( ARRAY_WHERE( EACH [Task Group], $(i, item) $i < [LineNumber] ) );
RETURN IF( AND( [New Task Group] == TRUE, ISNULL([Task Group]) ), "",
[New Task Group] <> TRUE, $mostRecentCategory,
AND( [New Task Group] == TRUE, NOT(ISNULL([Task Group])) ), [Task Group] )

Column.Name: Task Group Duration
Timeline Total Days
Parent Structure

FieldEntry.Formula:
IF( [Task Group]#[LineNumber] + 1 = NULL(),
ARRAY_CONCAT( EACH [Task Name], "" ),
EACH [Task Name] )

IF( [Timeline Weekdays Only], TODAY(WORKDAY([Task Start Date]#[LineNumber],[Default Duration])),
TODAY(DATEADD("day", [Default Duration], [Task Start Date]#[LineNumber])) )
